Name: Attacker - Sharp Blade
Description: 1. Commands a teammate to trigger a <color=#6495ED>Red Orb 3-Ping</color> and <color=#6495ED>Matrix</color> behind the target.\n2. All team members gain <color=#6495ED>Super Armor</color> and deals <color=#6495ED>30%</color> more damage for <color=#6495ED>10s</color>.

Name: Attacker - Life Devourer
Description: 1. Commands a teammate to trigger a <color=#6495ED>Red Orb 3-Ping</color> and <color=#6495ED>Matrix</color> behind the target.\n2. All team members gain <color=#6495ED>Super Armor</color> and <color=#6495ED>5% ATK Blood Draining</color> for <color=#6495ED>10s</color>.

Name: Tank - Crushbone
Description: 1. Commands a teammate to trigger a <color=#6495ED>Yellow Orb 3-Ping</color> and <color=#6495ED>Matrix</color> before target.\n2. All members gain <color=#6495ED>80% DMG Reduction.</color> for <color=#6495ED>10s</color>. Reduces target's <color=#6495ED>DEF by 30%</color> for <color=#6495ED>8s</color>.

Name: Tank - Shade
Description: 1. Commands a teammate to trigger a <color=#6495ED>Yellow Orb 3-Ping</color> and <color=#6495ED>Matrix</color> before the target.\n2. All team members gain <color=#6495ED>80% DMG Reduction</color> and a <color=#6495ED>Shield equal to 50% max HP</color> for <color=#6495ED>10s</color>.

Name: Support - Breakthrough
Description: 1. Commands a teammate to trigger a <color=#6495ED>Blue Orb 3-Ping</color> and <color=#6495ED>Matrix</color> behind the target.\n2. <color=#6495ED>Dispels all teammates' Speed-Down</color>, and in the next <color=#6495ED>5s</color>, <color=#6495ED>all Pings will be counted as 3-Pings</color>.

Name: Support - Final Radiance
Description: 1. Commands a teammate to trigger a <color=#6495ED>Blue Orb 3-Ping</color> and <color=#6495ED>Matrix</color> behind the target.\n2. <color=#6495ED>Dispels all teammates' Speed-Down</color> and restores <color=#6495ED> their HP to full</color>.

Description: 1. Commands a teammate to trigger a <color=#6495ED>Blue Orb 3-Ping</color> and <color=#6495ED>Matrix</color> behind the target.\n2. <color=#6495ED>Dispels all teammates' Speed-Down</color> and restores <color=#6495ED> their HP to full</color>.
